critique: The executive order seems to be a technical document about postal service regulations. It is unlikely to evoke strong emotions. The primary goal appears to be clarity and adherence to existing laws. Therefore, the scores for all emotions should be relatively low. I will set joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, and surprise all to 1 initially. After further consideration, I don't think any of these emotions are really intended to be conveyed, so I will revise all scores to 0.
